Prevents your weapon from losing sharpness during critical hits
1. Grants a 20% chance of no sharpness loss while active
2. Grants a 40% chance of no sharpness loss while active
3. Grants a 80% chance of no sharpness loss while active
Extends the weapon sharpness gauge, however it will not increase the gaugepast its maximum
1. Weapon sharpness +10
2. Weapon sharpness +20
3. Weapon sharpness +30
4. Weapon sharpness +40
5. Weapon sharpness +50
Good chance of increased quest rewards (no effect when joining mid-quest
1. Slightly increases luck
2. Increases luck
3. Greatly increases luck
Grants hellfire resistance and confers explosive hellfire power to your attacks
1. Reduces damge from hellfire
2. Increases damage from hellfire blasts
3. Inflicts hellfire blight when monsters are enraged
Effects persists for one minute after a monster\'s rage has subsided
Prevents attacks from knocking you back during a jump
@string/activate
Improves light bowgun rapid fire
1. Rapid fire damage +5%
2. Rapid fire damage +10%
3. Rapid fire damage +20%
Bow and bowgun shots have a chance to not expend coatings or ammo
1. Activates 3% of the time
2. Activates 10% of the time
3. Activates 20% of the time
Prevents your weapon from losing sharpness
1. Activates 10% of the time
3. Activates 25% of the time
1. Activates 50% of the time
Increases the attack power of spread ammo and spead type arrows
1. Slightly increases the power of spread ammo, shrapnel ammo and spread type arrows (5%)
2. Increases the power of spread ammo, shrapnel ammo and spread type arrows (10%)
3. Greatly increases the power of spread ammo, shrapnel ammo and spread type arrows (20%)
Increases the attack power of piercing ammo and piercing type arrows
1. Slightly increases the power of piercing ammo and piercing type arrows (5%)
2. Increases the power of piercing ammo and piercing type arrows (10%)
3. Greatly increases the power of piercing ammo and piercing type arrows (20%)
Increases the attack power of normal ammo and rapid type arrows
1. Slightly increases the power of normal ammo and rapid type arrows (5%)
2. Increases the power of normal ammo and rapid type arrows (10%)
3. Greatly increases the power of pnormal ammo and rapid type arrows (20%)
Weapon sharpness does not decrease for a set time after sharpening
1. Effect lasts 30 seconds
2. Effect lasts 60 seconds
3. Effect lasts 90 seconds
Increases blast element attack power
1. Blast buildup +5% Bonus +1
2. Blast buildup +10% Bonus +2
3. Blast buildup +20% Bonus +5
Increases sleep element attack power (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit)
Sleep buildup +5% and Bonus +1
Sleep buildup +10% and Bonus +2
Sleep buildup +20% and Bonus +5
Increases paralysis element attack power (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit)
Paralysis buildup +5% and Bonus +1
Paralysis buildup +10% and Bonus +2
Paralysis buildup +20% and Bonus +5
Temporarily increases affinity and reduces stamina depletion when certain conditions are met
1: While active, increases affinity by 10% and reduces stamina depletion by 30%
2. While active, increases affinity by 20% and reduces stamina depletion by 30%
3. While active, increases affinity by 30% and reduces stamina depletion by 50%
4. While active, increases affinity by 40% and reduces stamina depletion by 50%
5. While active, increases affinity by 50% and reduces stamina depletion by 50%
Increases attack while you are suffering from an abnormal status
1. Attack +5 while active
2. Attack +10 while active
3. Attack +20 while active
Increases attack when you have recoverable damage
1. Attack +5 while active
2. Attack +10 while active
3. Attack +15 while active
4. Attack +20 while active
5. Attack +25 while active
Increases attack when your health is full
1. Attack +5 while active
2. Attack +10 while active
3. Attack +20 while active
Increases attack power and affinity when large monsters become enraged
1. Attack +4 and affinity +3% while active
2. Attack +8 and affinity +5% while active
3. Attack +12 and affinity +7% while active
4. Attack +16 and affinity +10% while active
5. Attack +20 and affinity +15% while active
Increases affinity of attacks that exploit a monster weak spot
1. Attacks that hit weak spots have 15% increased affinity
2. Attacks that hit weak spots have 30% increased affinity
3. Attacks that hit weak spots have 50% increased affinity
Increases damage of critical hits
1. Increases damage dealt by critical hits to 30%
2. Increases damage dealt by critical hits to 35%
3. Increases damage dealt by critical hits to 40%
Increases bowgun loading capacity (There is a cap to loading capacity)
1. Expands clip size for some ammo types
2. Expands clip size for many ammo types
3. Expands clip size for most ammo types
Temporarily increases attack power after executing a perfectly-timed guard
1. +5% while active
2. +10% while active
3. +15% while active
Lets you digest mushrooms that would otherwise be inedible and gain their advantageous effects
1. Lets you digest blue mushrooms and toadstools
2. Additionally lets you digest nitroshrooms and parashrooms
3. Additionally lets you digest mandragoras and exciteshrooms
Increases affinity for a short time after performing a draw attack (Does not include silkbind attacks)
1. Affinity +10%
2. Affinity +20%
3. Affinity +40%
shortens the distance before ammo and arrows reach maximum power
1. Slightly extends range
2. Extends range
3. Greatly extends range
Increases elemental damage(fire, water, thunder, ice, dragon) when landing critical hits
1. Grants elemental damage +5% while active
2. Grants elemental damage +10% while active
3. Grants elemental damage +15% while active
Strengthens explosive attacks like shells, wyvern\'s fire, charge blade phial attacks and sticky ammo
1. Increases power of attack by 10% and reduces wyvern\'s fire cooldown by 15%
2. Increases power of attack by 20% and reduces wyvern\'s fire cooldown by 30%
3. Increases power of attack by 30% and reduces wyvern\'s fire cooldown by 50%
Slows down stamina depletion of actions which continuously drain stamina (such as dashing)
1. Reduces continuous stamina depletion by 15%
2. Reduces continuous stamina depletion by 30%
3. Reduces continuous stamina depletion by 50%
Increases the fill rate for weapon gauges and the charge rate for weapons with charge attacks
1. 5% faster gauge fill and 5% faster charge times
2. 10% faster gauge fill and 10% faster charge times
3. 20% faster gauge fill and 15% faster charge times
Your attacks are deflected less and deal more damage to hard targets
1. +10% damage to hard targets and 50% reduction to you attacks being deflected
2. +15% damage to hard targets and 100% reduction to you attacks being deflected
3. +30% damage to hard targets and 100% reduction to you attacks being deflected
Increases attack power and defense when health drops to 35% or lower
1. While active, increases defense by 50 points
2. Attack +5% and defense +50 while active
3. Attack +5% and defense +100 while active
4. Attack +10 and defense +100 while active
5. Attack +30% and defense increasing effects are negated
Increases the power of bowgun special ammo and dragon piercer
1. Increases power of bowgun special ammo and dragon piercer by 10%
2. Increases power of bowgun special ammo and dragon piercer by 20%
Improves reloading and increases the gunlance\'s shell capacity and charge blade\'s phial capacity
1. Increases ammo and coating reload speed
2. Gunlance loading capacity +1, increases charge blade phials
Allows you to guard against ordinarily unblockable attacks
1. Reduces damage taken by 30%
2. Reduces damage taken by 50%
3. Reduces damage taken by 80%
Reduces knockbacks and stamina depletion when guarding
1. Very slightly decreases the impact of attacks
2. Slightly decreases the impact of attacks and reduces stamina depletion by 15%
3. Decreases the impact of attacks and reduces stamina depletion by 15%
4. Decreases the impact of attacks and reduces stamina depletion by 30%
5. Greatly decreases the impact of attacks and reduces stamina depletion by 30%
Speeds up stamina recover
1. Stamina recover speed +10%
2. Stamina recover speed +20%
3. Stamina recover speed +40%
Long swords, dual blades, insect glaives, switch axes and charge blades stay powered up longer
1. Slightly boosts the duration weapons are powere up
2. Boosts the duration weapons are powered up
3. Greatly boosts the duration weapons are powered up
Increases affinity if stamina is kept full for a period of time
1. While active, increases affinity by 10%
2. While active, increases affinity by 20%
3. While active, increases affinity by 30%
Increases attack power
1. Attack +3
2. Attack +6
3. Attack +9
4. Attack +5% Bonus +7
5. Attack +6% Bonus +8
6. Attack +8% Bonus +9
7. Attack +10% + 10
Increases affinity
1. Affinity +5%
2. Affinity +10%
3. Affinity +15%
4. Affinity +20%
5. Affinity +25%
6. Affinity +30%
7. Affinity +40%
Increases switch speed and power for switch axes and charge blades
1. Speed +10%
2. Speed +20% Morph attack damage +10%
3. Speed +30% Morph attack damage +20%
Reduces recoil while firing bowgun ammo
1. Recoil -1
2. Recoil -2
3. Recoil -3
Increases attack power when your weapon sharpness is low
1. +5% attack power when your weapon sharpness gauge is yellow or lower
2. +10% attack power when your weapon sharpness gauge is yellow or lower
3. +10% attack power when your weapon sharpness gauge is green or lower
Increases bowgun reloading and bow coating loading speed
1. Bowgun speed +1, improves bow handling
1. Bowgun speed +2, loads bow coating automatically
1. Bowgun speed +3
Reduces stun duration
1. Reduces the duration of stun by 60%
2. Reduces the duration of stun by 90%
3. Prevents stun
Grants protection against ground tremors
1. Nullifies minor ground tremors
2. Nullifies minor ground tremors and reduces the effects of major ground tremors
3. Nullifies minor and major ground tremors
Grants protection from large monsters roars
1. Reduces the effects of weak monster roars
2. Nullifies weak monsters roars
3. Nullifies weak monsters roars and reduces the effects of strong monsters roars
4. Nullifies weak and strong monster roars
5. Nullifies weak and strong monster roars. Reduces the effects of powerful monster roars
Temporarily increases attack power after being thrown off
1. Attack +10 after activation
2. Attack +15 after activation
3. Attack +25 after activation
Reduces bubbleblight and grants increases evasion when afflicted
1. Reduce the effects of weak bubbleblight
2. Nullifies major and minor bubbleblight
Suppresses the deviation of bowgun shots
1. Deviation -1
2. Deviation -2
Adds a stun effect to draw attacks and slightly increases attack power (Does not include Silkbind attacks)
1. Applies a minor chance to stun, attack power of draw attacks +3
2. Applies a chance to stun, attack power of draw attacks +5
3. Applies a great chance to stun, attack power of draw attacks +7
Increases evade distance
1. Slightly extends evasion distance
2. Extends evasion distance
3. Greatly extends evasion distance
Extends the invulnerability period when evading
1. Very slightly increases invulnerability window
2. Slightly increases invulnerability window
3. Increases invulnerability window
4. Greatly increases invulnerability window
5. Massively increases invulnerability window
Prevents knockbacks and other reactions to small damage
1. Prevents knockbacks
2. Prevents knockbacks, tripping is reduced to a knockback instead
3. Prevents knockbacks and tripping
Speeds up weapon sheathing
1. Slightly increases sheathing speed
2. Moderately increases sheating speed
3. Greatly increaess sheathing speed
Grants protection against wind pressure
1. Negates minor wind pressure
2. Negates minor and major wind pressure
3. Negates minor and major wind pressure and reduces the effects of dragon wind pressure
Makes it easier to stun monsters
1. Stun power +20%
2. Stun power +30%
3. Stun power +40%
Allows the effects of certain items to also affect nearby allies
1. Items affect nearby allies with 33% of their efficacy
2. Items affect nearby allies in a wider radius with 33% of their efficacy
3. Items affect nearby allies in a wider radius with 66% of their efficacy
4. Items affect nearby allies in a much wider radius with 66% of their efficacy
5. Items affect nearby allies in a much wider radius with their full efficacy
Makes it easier to break or sever parts of large monsters
1. Part damage +10%
2. Part damage +20%
3. Part damage +30%
Grants protection against all elemental blights
1. Reduces the duration of all elemental blights by 50%
2. Reduces the duration of all elemental blights by 75%
3. Nullifies all elemental blights
Increases meat-eating and item-consumption speed
1. Slightly increases eating speed
2. Increases eating speed
3. Greatly increases eating speed
Improves your handling of wirebugs
1. Extends the duration you can keep a wirebug by 30%
2. Further increases passive wirebug recovery rate
3. Further increases passive recovery rate while on the ground
Has a predetermined chance of reducing the damage you take
1. While active, reduces damage taken by 15%
2. While active, reduces damage taken by 30%
3. While active, reduces damage taken by 50%
Reduces stamina consumption when running on walls
1. Reduces stamina consumption by 25% while wall running
2. Reduces stamina consumption by 50% while wall running
3. Wall running temporarily increases attack power
Speeds up weapon sharpening when using a whetstone
1. Removes one cycle from the sharpening process
2. Removes two cycle from the sharpening process
3. Removes three cycle from the sharpening process
Extends the duration of some item effects
1. Item effect duration +10%
2. Item effect duration +25%
3. Item effect duration +50%
Speeds healing of recoverable damage(red portion of the health gauge)
1. Doubles the speed at which you heal recoverable damage
2. Triples the speed at which you heal recoverable damage
3. Quadruples the speed at which you heal recoverable damage
Increases the amount recovered when restoring health
1. Slightly increases recovery
2. Increases recovery
3. Greatly increases recovery
Increases overall performance speed and shockwave damage
@string/activate
Increases certain attacks\' ability to exhaust monsters
1. Exhaust power +20%
2. Exhaust power +30%
3. Exhaust power +40%
Reduces stamina depletion when evading, blocking or doing certain other activities
1. Reduces fixed stamina depletion by 10%
2. Reduces fixed stamina depletion by 20%
3. Reduces fixed stamina depletion by 30%
4. Reduces fixed stamina depletion by 40%
5. Reduces fixed stamina depletion by 50%
Increases poison element attack power (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit)
Poison buildup +5% and Bonus +1
Poison buildup +10% and Bonus +2
Poison buildup +20% and Bonus +5
Sliding increases your affinity for a short time
Enables skill use
Increases the damge of explosive items
1. Explosive power +10%
2. Explosive power +20%
3. Explosive power +30%
Increases fire element attack power (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit)
1. Fire attack +2
2. Fire attack +3
3. Fire attack +5%, Bonus: +4
4. Fire attack +10%, Bonus: +4
5. Fire attack +20%, Bonus: +4
Increases water element attack power (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit)
1. Water attack +2
2. Water attack +3
3. Water attack +5%, Bonus: +4
4. Water attack +10%, Bonus: +4
5. Water attack +20%, Bonus: +4
Increases thunder element attack power (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit)
1. Thunder attack +2
2. Thunder attack +3
3. Thunder attack +5%, Bonus: +4
4. Thunder attack +10%, Bonus: +4
5. Thunder attack +20%, Bonus: +4
Increases ice element attack power (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit)
1. Ice attack +2
2. Ice attack +3
3. Ice attack +5%, Bonus: +4
4. Ice attack +10%, Bonus: +4
5. Ice attack +20%, Bonus: +4
Increases dragon element attack power (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit)
1. Dragon attack +2
2. Dragon attack +3
3. Dragon attack +5%, Bonus: +4
4. Dragon attack +10%, Bonus: +4
5. Dragon attack +20%, Bonus: +4
Increases defense. Resistances will also improve as the level increases
1. Defense +5
2. Defense +10
3. Defense +5% and Bonus +10
4. Defense +5% and Bonus +20, all elemental resistances +3
5. Defense +8% and Bonus +20, all elemental resistances +3
6. Defense +8% and Bonus +35, all elemental resistances +5
7. Defense +10% and Bonus +35, all elemental resistances +5
Prevents knockback from attacks while carving
@string/activate
Improves your Wyvern Riding skills
Makes filling the riding gauge easier and increases ease of parrying
Reduces maximum stamina depletion over time
1. Extends the time until your stamina cap reduces by 50%
2. Extends the time until your stamina cap reduces by 100%
3. Prevents your stamina cap from decreasing
Gives you a predetermined chance of consuming food or drink item for free
1. Activates 10% of the time
2. Activates 25% of the time
3. Activates 45% of the time
Reduces impairments to mobility while stuck in monster muck or deep snow
1. Reduces limits on movement speed
2. Negates limits to movement speed
Increases the attention drawn when attacking a monster
@string/activate
Allows you to dive-evade when facing towards large monsters, and extends the dive-evade distance
Enables skill use
Increases you attack and defense when you fall in battle (Disabled for some quests, can stack twice)
Increases attack by 10% and defense by 15% with each use
Increases the number of times ou can use a gathering point
1. Allows you to gather one extra time from bonepiles
2. Allows you to gather one extra time from gathering points
3. Allows you to gather one extra time from mining outcrops
Increases the quantity of herbs and other consumable items you gather
1. One extra consumable herb item per gather
2. One extra consumable herb, fruit, nut or seed item per gather
3. One extra consumable herb, fruit, nut, seed or insect item per gather
4. One extra consumable herb, fruit, nut, seed, insect or mushroom item per gather
Grants protection against blastblight
1. Delays blastblight and reduces blast damage
2. Greatly delays blastblight and greatly reduces blast damage
3. Prevents blastblight
Reduces duration of sleep
1. Reduces the duration of sleep by 30%
2. Reduces the duration of sleep by 60%
3. Prevents sleep
Reduces duration of paralysis
1. Reduces duration of paralysis by 30%
2. Reduces duration of paralysis by 60%
3. Prevents paralysis
Reduces damage while poisoned
1. Reduces the number of times you take poison damage
2. Greatly educes the number of times you take poison damage
3. Prevents poison and reduces venom
Increases fire resistance, also improves defense at higher levels
1. Fire resistance +6
2. Fire resistance +12
3. Fire resistance +20 and Defense +10
Increases water resistance, also improves defense at higher levels
1. Water resistance +6
2. Water resistance +12
3. Water resistance +20 and Defense +10

3. Thunder resistance +20 and Defense +10
Increases ice resistance, also improves defense at higher levels

3. Ice resistance +20 and Defense +10

Increases max bow charge level by one

High chance of increased capture rewards (no effect when joining mid-quest)

Gain the power of the elder dragon Chameleos
1. Sometimes increases the effects of Spiribirds
2. Also negates minor and major wind pressure
3. Also extends the duration of your poison\'s effect on monsters
4. Also negates all wind pressure
Gain the power of the elder dragon Kushala Daora
1. Water and Ice attack +5%
2. Water and Ice attack +10%
3. Also allows recovery toe exceed the red portion of the health gauge
4. Also nullifies heat damage
Gain the power of he elder dragon Teostra
1. Fire attack and blast buildup +5%
2. Fire attack and blast buildup +10%
3. Also prevents poison and venom
4. Alo Negates theft
Draconic energy fills you after losing a certain amount of health, weapons lose all non-dragon effects
1. When your health is at 50% or less, you contract dragonblight, and all elemental resistances are set to 30
1. When your health is at 50% or less, you contract dragonblight, and all elemental resistances are set to 50
1. When your health is at 70% or less, you contract dragonblight, and all elemental resistances are set to 50
1. When your health is at 70% or less, you contract dragonblight, and all elemental resistances are set to 50 and gain 5% attack power
1. When your health is at 80% or less, you contract dragonblight, and all elemental resistances are set to 50 and gain 10% attack power

Strengthens thunder and dragon power and improves skills of the same element
